title: I am in Class X. How do I prepare for SAT? My basics are not very strong. - Quora
tags: Advice About the SAT (standardized college admission test)

response.answer_text: You can just get this...    ​​​From the people who run the show!  This is the college board's own SAT guide with everything you need to know and show about the SAT!  (Tried and tested by your's truly! I really find it comfortable and helpful.)  If you intend to buy it soon then there's an amazing 50+% discount available via the Amazon shopping app.  So hurry!  ( Additional advice -  Do your research. Decide whether you want to give SAT or ACT first. It's never good to waste money, even if it's on a great deal like this. )  2. We are on quora!  Follow the topics you need! SAT, ACT, TOEFL,  IELTS, Studying abroad, college admissions, engineering, specific universities and colleges and whatever and follow people who are active with these like the most viewed writers! That helps a lot! ( If you have trouble finding them, message me, I'll help you out. )  3. Google. Knowledge is power, up-to-date knowledge is power to succeed. Make Google your best friend and research, research and RESEARCH!  4. You have a more than sufficient amount of time, time that late-risers like me would kill to have! Utilise it. Begin early. All you need to clear your basics is practice, practice and PRACTICE! So, be wise and get going ASAP!  Hope this helps!
For now, stress on the English part! It's harder than anything you've seen till now! Read a lot, read with interest, work on vocabulary, watch a lot of TV series with subtitles! Will work fine!
